name: time to run; a virtual board game
name_original: time to run; a virtual board game
description:
your friends decided to play an unfamiliar game called "he's coming" and you don't know what the actual duck is going on so you join in not knowing what to do

the objective is to get all 5 coins while not being tagged

how to play:

when it is your turn, click on your piece. you can move it left, down, up and right. no diagonals. avoid the tagger while getting 5 coins.

the red one always prioritizes moving up and down first

the purple one always prioritizes moving left and right first

the little swirly thing teleports you to a random grid square from 1-99 (randomly on the map).
